channel.title: CVE Feed for Digi -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Digi -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2634|2024-08-03T00:46:03.490Z -- digi -- connectport%20x2d
item.description: An attacker may be able to execute malicious actions due to the lack of device access protections and device permissions when using the web application. This could lead to uploading python files which can be later executed.
